content.rendered:
CORE single weave suits (beginners of all ages)

Size (height cm)           Price

110 –                               $60

120 –                               $65

130 –                               $70

140 –                               $75

150 –                               $80

160 –                               $100

170 –                               $110

180 –                               $115

190 –                               $120

200 –                               $120

Contact us to order

**** Blue or White available****

Double weave suits available (heavy and competition ready)
